thread.title: Definitely will stay again
thread.title_full: Definitely will stay again - Review of Comfort Inn Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah-Louise A
title: Definitely will stay again
text:
Loved my stay at Comfort Inn Lower East Side. The room was immaculate and the bed incredibly comfortable. Yes the rooms are very small so if you need a room with lots of space this isn't for you, but if you're looking for cleanliness, comfort and fabulously friendly staff I would highly recommend.
Breakfast is a mix of breads, waffles, cereals and sausage and egg patties.
Nearest tube is East Broadway and is 5 mins walk.
If you get chance ask to go on the roof top terrace.
The staff are so incredibly helpful, nothing was too much trouble...including ordering pizza (Thanks Stephanie!)
Try and ask for a room away from the lift/stairwell as it can get a bit noisy. I was in 506 right by the lift.
See all photos
